mapper.sql: PID, ens_mon_det_type, customer_id, borrow_id, happen_value, actor_user,cator_time,fee_type, balance, status, create_user, create_time, last_update_user, last_update_time, ens_mon_det_desc

d.PID, d.ens_mon_det_type, (FUNC_GET_DICT_CONT_NAME('ENS_MON_DET_TYPE',d.ens_mon_det_type)) as ens_mon_det_type_name, d.customer_id, d.borrow_id, d.happen_value, IF(d.fee_type = 1,d.happen_value,null)as income, IF(d.fee_type = 2,d.happen_value,null)as expenditures, d.actor_user, (FUNC_GET_USER_NAME(d.actor_user)) as actor_user_name, d.cator_time, d.fee_type, d.balance, d.status, d.create_user, d.create_time, d.last_update_user, d.last_update_time, d.ens_mon_det_desc, c.customer_name, c.sname, c.phone_no
mapper.select:
select
from t_biz_ensure_money_detail d left join t_cust_customer c on d.customer_id = c.pid where 1 = 1
order by cator_time desc

if.test: expm.exportSet == 2 and expm.startCheckpage != null and expm.endCheckpage != null
expm.exportSet == 3 and expm.startCheckrecords != null and expm.endCheckrecords != null

update t_biz_ensure_money_detail
ens_mon_det_type = #{ensMonDetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
